title: Rumors from the Boys' Room
description: Sofia Becker, Middlebrooke Middle School blogger extraordinaire, is back! And this time her gossip isn't only from the girls' room. The rumor mill is out of control at Sofia's school, so it's a good thing Sofia and her super-secret notebook can set everyone straight. Entertaining and funny, this second novel in the BLOGTASTIC! series by Rose Cooper features super-cute black-and-white illustrations . . . girls will love passing this book around with their friends!
author: Rose Cooper
